mapper.select: SELECT C.Q_NO , C.Q_TITLE , C.Q_CONTENT , C.Q_IMG , M.MEMBER_NO , M.NICK , TO_CHAR (C.Q_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , C.ADMIN_NO , C.A_CONTENT , C.A_YN , TO_CHAR (C.A_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANSWER_DATE FROM CUSTOMER_CENTER C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY Q_NO DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT C.Q_NO , C.Q_TITLE , C.Q_CONTENT , C.Q_IMG , M.MEMBER_NO , M.NICK , TO_CHAR (C.Q_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , C.ADMIN_NO , C.A_CONTENT , C.A_YN , TO_CHAR (C.A_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANSWER_DATE FROM CUSTOMER_CENTER C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY Q_NO DESC

SELECT C.Q_NO , C.Q_TITLE , C.Q_CONTENT , C.Q_IMG , M.MEMBER_NO , M.NICK , TO_CHAR (C.Q_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , C.ADMIN_NO , C.A_CONTENT , C.A_YN , TO_CHAR (C.A_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANSWER_DATE FROM CUSTOMER_CENTER C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE C.Q_NO = #{qNo}
